name: 罗伯特·H·利勃曼
name_full: 罗伯特·H·利勃曼 Robert H. Lieberman

last_movies.title: Angkor Awakens: A Portrait of Cambodia

introduction: Robert H. Lieberman is a best-selling novelist and film director and a long-time member of the Physics faculty at Cornell University.For over a half century Robert H. Lieberman has been writing critically acclaimed novels, including the best-sellers “Paradise Rezoned” and “Baby.” His novels also include “The Boys of Truxton,” “Goobersville Breakdown” “Neighbors” and “Perfect People.”His film, “They Call It Myanmar,” was a New York Times Critics Pick and named a top documentary of 2012 by film critic Roger Ebert.Among his previous films are the highly praised comedy "Green Lights", and the award-winning feature documentaries "Last Stop Kew Gardens," "Faces In A Famine" and "BoyceBall."
